Class WorldTest

java.lang.Object
WorldTest
class WorldTest extends Object
Test class for World functionality. This class verifies the behavior of world navigation, room management, locking mechanisms, and file loading operations.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp()
      Initializes test environment before each test method execution. Creates mock objects and sets up a basic world with two connected rooms.

    • moveToRoom_ValidMove_UpdatesCurrentRoom

      @Test void moveToRoom_ValidMove_UpdatesCurrentRoom()
      Tests successful room navigation when moving to a valid adjacent room. Verifies that current room updates correctly.

    • findRoomByName_ExistingRoom_ReturnsRoom

      @Test void findRoomByName_ExistingRoom_ReturnsRoom()
      Tests room lookup by name functionality. Verifies that existing rooms can be found by their name.

    • initializeLocks_SetsCorrectLockConditions

      @Test void initializeLocks_SetsCorrectLockConditions()
      Tests initialization of room locking mechanisms. Verifies that special rooms get their lock conditions properly configured.

    • insertGearPiece_InCellarWithValidGear_UpdatesGearLock

      @Test void insertGearPiece_InCellarWithValidGear_UpdatesGearLock()
      Tests gear piece insertion mechanism in the Cellar room. Verifies that valid gear pieces are properly registered in the gear lock system.

    • loadFromFile_ValidFiles_PopulatesRoomsAndSearchSpots

      @Test void loadFromFile_ValidFiles_PopulatesRoomsAndSearchSpots(@TempDir Path tempDir) throws Exception
      Tests world initialization from file system. Verifies that rooms and search spots are properly loaded from configuration files.
      Parameters:
      tempDir - Temporary directory provided by JUnit for test file storage
      Throws:
      Exception - if file operations fail
